com.gsma.services.rcs.chat

Class ChatService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsma.services.rcs.JoynService
      • com.gsma.services.rcs.chat.ChatService

  • public class ChatService
extends JoynService
    Chat service offers the main entry point to initiate chat 1-1 ang group conversations with contacts. Several applications may connect/disconnect to the API. The parameter contact in the API supports the following formats: MSISDN in national or international format, SIP address, SIP-URI or Tel-URI.
    Author:
    Jean-Marc AUFFRET

      • openSingleChat

        public Chat openSingleChat(java.lang.String contact,
                  ChatListener listener)
                    throws JoynServiceException,
                           JoynContactFormatException
        Open a single chat with a given contact and returns a Chat instance. The parameter contact supports the following formats: MSISDN in national or international format, SIP address, SIP-URI or Tel-URI.
        Parameters:
        contact - Contact
        listener - Chat event listener
        Returns:
        Chat or null
        Throws:
        JoynServiceException
        JoynContactFormatException

      • initiateGroupChat

        public GroupChat initiateGroupChat(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> contacts,
                          java.lang.String subject,
                          GroupChatListener listener)
                            throws JoynServiceException,
                                   JoynContactFormatException
        Initiates a group chat with a group of contact and returns a GroupChat instance. The subject is optional and may be null.
        Parameters:
        contact - List of contacts
        subject - Subject
        listener - Chat event listener
        Throws:
        JoynServiceException
        JoynContactFormatException
